name: Abramovich For Whom the Bell Tolls

metadata.name: Abramovich : signature series
metadata.description:
For Whom the Bell Tolls. Abramovich wearing a kilt ringing Lenin's head in a golden bell.
The original sculpture is kept in a private collection in London.
Description of the original sculpture: silver - 6,2 kg,
gold-57gr, height - 60 cm
